name: speechlessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the feeling of being unable to speak because you are so angry, shocked, surprised, etc.: She was stunned to speechlessness by his marriage proposal. I was shocked to the point of speechlessness. See
speechless
More examplesFewer examplesShe was reduced to speechlessness by what he told her.He once reduced a senior official to speechlessness by asking him why America needed a Federal Reserve at all.Even Andrew was startled into speechlessness by her outburst.
